subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Behind Stephen Curry’s 33 points, Golden State unearthed its high-octane offense while figuring out a few ways to slow Memphis in Game 4 of a Western Conference semifinal series.
snippet: Behind Stephen Curry’s 33 points, Golden State unearthed its high-octane offense while figuring out a few ways to slow Memphis in Game 4 of a Western Conference semifinal series.
